publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-928 Donald Gorrie: Developing Football in Scotland-That the Parliament urges the Scottish Football Association and all the other organisations involved in managing or promoting football in Scotland for all ages and both sexes to work together to develop a more coherent and effective structure for developing football in Scotland. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-928 Developing Football in Scotland (lodged on 23 February 2004) Mark Ballard*, Christine Grahame*

S2M-928 Donald Gorrie: Developing Football in Scotland-That the Parliament urges the Scottish Football Association and all the other organisations involved in managing or promoting football in Scotland for all ages and both sexes to work together to develop a more coherent and effective structure for developing football in Scotland. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Rosie Kane, Mark Ballard, Christine Grahame
S2M-928 Developing Football in Scotland (lodged on 23 February 2004) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-928 Developing Football in Scotland (lodged on 23 February 2004) Elaine Smith*
